code: import React from'react';import'./Accessories.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const accessories=[{id:1,name:"PS5 Custom LED Controller",description:"Enhance your gaming with a custom LED-lit controller designed for comfort and performance.",image:"ccustom.webp"},{id:2,name:"PS5 Spiderman Edition Controller",description:"Swing into action with this special edition Spiderman controller, featuring a unique design and responsive controls.",image:"cspirderman.jpeg"},{id:3,name:"PS5 Dual Sense Edge",description:"Experience ultimate control with the PS5 Dual Sense Edge, offering customizable options for every gamer.",image:"dual.png"},{id:4,name:"Razor BlackShark V2",description:"Immerse yourself in the game with the Razor BlackShark V2, featuring high-fidelity audio and noise cancellation.",image:"blacksharkv2.webp"},{id:5,name:"Razor BlackShark V2 Adder",description:"Upgrade your setup with the Razor BlackShark V2 Adder, known for its comfort and superior sound quality.",image:"adder.jpeg"},{id:6,name:"PS5 God Of War Edition Controller",description:"Conquer your enemies with the God Of War Edition controller, showcasing a design inspired by the iconic game.",image:"cgow.png"}];const Accessories=()=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"accessories",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Gaming Accessories"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"accessories-list",children:accessories.map(accessory=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"accessory-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:accessory.image,alt:accessory.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:accessory.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:accessory.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"buy-now",children:"Buy Now"})]},accessory.id))})]});};export default Accessories;
